Article.ArticleTitle: Seroepidemiology of Human Enterovirus 71 Infection among Children, Cambodia.

Abstract.AbstractText: Enterovirus 71 is reported to have emerged in Cambodia in 2012; at least 54 children with severe encephalitis died during that outbreak. We used serum samples collected during 2000-2011 to show that the virus had been widespread in the country for at least a decade before the 2012 outbreak.
